title: 'In the fear... ': Prince Harry reveals why he, wife Meghan Markle stepped down from royal duties and moved to USA
Sri Lankan minister hails UK's decision to maintain LTTE under proscribed list; says move to prevent group from revival
content: Sri Lankan FM Ali Sabry praises UK's decision to maintain LTTE on proscribed list, thwarting group's revival plans in Sri Lanka. LTTE's international network aims to deproscribe to revive group.
summary: Sri Lankan FM Ali Sabry praises UK's decision to maintain LTTE on proscribed list, thwarting group's revival plans in Sri Lanka. LTTE's international network aims to deproscribe to revive group.

title: Drone attack damages vessel west of Yemen's Hodeidah
content: A drone attack damaged a merchant vessel 65 nautical miles west of Yemen's Hodeidah, according to the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) and British security firm Ambrey on Sunday. Since November, Yemen's militant Houthi group has been launching drone and missile strikes in shipping lanes, expressing solidarity with Palestinians in Israel's conflict with Hamas militants in Gaza.
summary: A drone attack damaged a merchant vessel 65 nautical miles west of Yemen's Hodeidah, according to the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) and British security firm Ambrey on Sunday. Since November, Yemen's militant Houthi group has been launching drone and missile strikes in shipping lanes, expressing solidarity with Palestinians in Israel's conflict with Hamas militants in Gaza.

US mass shooting: Death toll rises to 4 in Arkansas grocery store attack
content: A fourth victim has died following a shooting at the Mad Butcher grocery store in Fordyce, Arkansas, which left 14 people injured, including nine civilians and two law enforcement officers. The suspect, Travis Eugene Posey, 44, has been charged with four counts of capital murder. Four of the wounded remain hospitalized, with one in critical condition.
summary: A fourth victim has died following a shooting at the Mad Butcher grocery store in Fordyce, Arkansas, which left 14 people injured, including nine civilians and two law enforcement officers. The suspect, Travis Eugene Posey, 44, has been charged with four counts of capital murder. Four of the wounded remain hospitalized, with one in critical condition.

title: Philippines not in business of instigating wars, says President Marcos
‘Uncertainty is suffocating’: Israeli hostage's mom pens emotional letter as thousands rally to mark her birthday
content: Israelis assembled in Tel Aviv to mark the 20th birthday of Naama Levy, a captive held by the Palestinian militant group Hamas in Gaza since October 7th. The protesters, accompanied by the rhythmic beating of drums, released balloons into the sky and chanted slogans. As they called for the freedom of all hostages taken by Hamas in the aftermath of their lethal assault on Israel, the demonstrators shared small cupcakes decorated with birthday candles.
summary: Israelis assembled in Tel Aviv to mark the 20th birthday of Naama Levy, a captive held by the Palestinian militant group Hamas in Gaza since October 7th. The protesters, accompanied by the rhythmic beating of drums, released balloons into the sky and chanted slogans. As they called for the freedom of all hostages taken by Hamas in the aftermath of their lethal assault on Israel, the demonstrators shared small cupcakes decorated with birthday candles.

title: Russian bomb attack kills three, leaves 52 injured in Ukraine's Kharkiv
'You have to vote' Trump tells US evangelical Christians
content: Former US president Donald Trump urged evangelical Christians Saturday to vote en masse for him in November, vowing to "aggressively" protect their religious freedom if he is elected. Trump promised to protect their interests Saturday, as he vowed to "aggressively defend religious freedom."
summary: Former US president Donald Trump urged evangelical Christians Saturday to vote en masse for him in November, vowing to "aggressively" protect their religious freedom if he is elected. Trump promised to protect their interests Saturday, as he vowed to "aggressively defend religious freedom."

title: Outrage as UK politician says West provoked Ukraine war

Yemen's Houthis conduct joint military operation targeting ships in Israel
content: Yemen's Houthi rebels, in coordination with the Islamic Resistance in Iraq, conducted a military operation targeting ships at Israel's Haifa port using drones. The attacks aimed to disrupt shipping in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza conflict. The Iranian-aligned Houthis have been involved in ongoing drone and missile strikes in shipping lanes, resulting in casualties and tensions.
summary: Yemen's Houthi rebels, in coordination with the Islamic Resistance in Iraq, conducted a military operation targeting ships at Israel's Haifa port using drones. The attacks aimed to disrupt shipping in solidarity with Palestinians in the Gaza conflict. The Iranian-aligned Houthis have been involved in ongoing drone and missile strikes in shipping lanes, resulting in casualties and tensions.
